properties.title: The Jakarta-Taglibs Project: Mailer Tag Library

section.name: Mailer Tag Library
section.p: This custom tag library is used to send e-mail.

news.newsitem: The nightly build now includes a Port tag for setting the SMTP port dynamically.

The nightly build now has support for the Server tag for setting the SMTP host dynamically. Many tags refactored to fix bugs when running in a JSP engine which supports custom tag pooling like Tomcat 4.1 with Jasper 2. This is considered version 1.1 Beta now.
